title: 189 Beacon St
posting_body: Front facing Beacon Street studio, (236 square feet)
Boasting 16 foot ceilings, new bathroom, large bay windows with plantation shutters.
Fireplace, Heat/AC included in rent.
Close to MGH, Charles River, just blocks from Boston Common Gardens, Boston Public Library and all the Back Bay has to offer.
I am looking for a working professional.
This is a great area for those working in health care or higher education.
I would prefer someone enjoys the old world feel of a classic brownstone, with the updated flairs of "Netflix"
I believe the ideal candidate will be a single, neat, go getter, who wants to see this historic city.
I can think of no better place to be than here on Beacon.
No Venmo
No Smoking
No Pets
No Rudeness to my lovely neighbors
Trash pick-up twice a week (Leave trash behind the building)
Coin operated washer dryer in building
Furnished
Metered parking available, tenants can apply for a resident parking
Netflix and Amazon Prime and The internet INCLUDED (There's still a pandemic, ya know)
Heat, A/C Included
Available: August 1, 2022 - Unit is a TAW.
I will discuss your preferred length of stay.
Please contact John @ the e-mail provided
